title: Avicii - Wake Me Up (Official Video)
description:
”It’s so far away from anything I’ve ever done before musically, so it’s obviously a weight off my shoulders that everything went the way it did” — Tim ’Avicii’ Bergling.
 
June 17th 2023 marks one decade since the release of Wake Me Up – a song that came to change EDM music forever. As a key part of the album True, Wake Me Up was one of the songs where Avicii showed the world his ability to blend different genres — transcending the boundaries of ages, music preferences, and cultures worldwide.

In loving memory of Tim Bergling (1989-2018).

Listen to more music by Avicii here: https://Avicii.lnk.to/Channel
In Dolby Atmos: https://avicii.lnk.to/SpatialAudio
